page.title: 08My School in Coulsdon
page.content: I am twelve years old and I am in the first year of a comprehensive school in Coulsdon. At school there are a number of lessons that I like, these are Art, Games, Computers and Home Economics. I like these lessons because I like doing things. I hate Religious Education and History because they are so boring. I do not like to get a detention, I do not think they teach children anything. I enjoy sports day, as long as I am not doing anything. I also enjoy doing gymnastics because it is fun. When I leave school I would like to be a secretary in an office because I want to work with other people.
